short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension adds your elemental damage and elemental elite damage to your official diablo 3 profile page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The new damage rows are added in the attributes section, right over your sheet damage. (See the provided screenshot)

v1.1:
- Added set bonuses
- Added tooltips

v1.0.1:
- Added support for HTTPS
